name: Color Splash: Predators
description:
Color Splash: Predators is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of cool predators and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful predators paintings.

You need to skillfully move puzzle pieces, find their corresponding places, and harmoniously connect the colored details. Paying great attention to detail and applying a creative approach will help you become a true master at assembling predators pictures.

Start gathering your collection of predators pictures right now!

In Color Splash: Predators:

•50 levels
•Colorful art
•Simple controls (mouse)
•Achievements
•Relaxing music
